医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国研究发现呼吸系统药物的销售对于预测疾病死亡率至关重要将全国纵向购物数据整合到呼吸道疾病预测模型中的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Sales-of-respiratory-medications-key-to-predicting-disease-mortality-UK-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Sales-of-respiratory-medications-key-to-predicting-disease-mortality-UK-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08309eab-f907-4deb-9c05-444f7bb567a5 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 05:03:00 -0500 Sales of respiratory medications key to predicting disease mortality, UK study finds

Yourgene Health 成为 PacBio 兼容合作伙伴：使 PacBio 客户能够优化长读长测序文库的大小选择Yourgene Health（Novacyt 集团公司的一部分）今天宣布开展合作，以优化长读长测序工作流程的大小选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Yourgene-Health-becomes-a-PacBio-known-partner-Enabling-PacBio-customers-to-optimize-size-selection-for-long-read-测序库.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Yourgene-Health-becomes-a-PacBio-known-partner-Enabling-PacBio-customers-to-optimize-size-selection-for-long-read-测序库.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d6ce6bd-b6ac-450f-a32c-12e760c89dc4 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 01:28:00 -0500 Yourgene Health becomes a PacBio compatible partner: Enabling PacBio customers to optimize size selection for long-read sequencing libraries
赢得环保试剂槽以减少塑料废物并成为更绿色的实验室！众所周知，实验室液体处理工作流程使用大量一次性塑料，但许多设施正在努力减少碳足迹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Win-environmentally-Friendly-reagent-reservoirs-to-decrease- Plastic-waste-and-become-a-greener-lab!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Win-environmentally-Friendly-reagent-reservoirs-to-decrease- Plastic-waste-and-become-a-greener-lab!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dc98038-1c8c-477e-939b-5691de902409 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 01:17:00 -0500 Win environmentally-friendly reagent reservoirs to decrease plastic waste and become a greener lab!
MaxCyte 作为创始成员加入 mRNA 药物联盟 (AMM) MaxCyte, Inc. 今天宣布，它已作为创始成员加入 mRNA 药物联盟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/MaxCyte-joins-the-alliance-for-mRNA-medicines-(AMM)-as-a-founding-member.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/MaxCyte-joins-the-alliance-for-mRNA-medicines-(AMM)-as-a-founding-member.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0149e94-e16f-4c77-bafb-d8b6f623de0c Wed, 22 Nov 2023 01:09:00 -0500 MaxCyte joins the alliance for mRNA medicines (AMM) as a founding member
微自噬在溶酶体修复、促进健康衰老中发挥着至关重要的作用变老还是不变老！衰老如何在细胞水平上影响生物体？什么机制可以帮助细胞在自身或外部伤害下生存？众所周知，溶酶体——极其重要的细胞结构——对于消化受损的细胞成分和病原体以及维持细胞和组织内的稳定性至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Microautophagy-plays-crucial-role-in-lysosome-repair-promoting-healthy-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Microautophagy-plays-crucial-role-in-lysosome-repair-promoting-healthy-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa99e8c9-f8fb-4cd1-b183-0bc03338909b Tue, 21 Nov 2023 22:46:25 -0500 Microautophagy plays crucial role in lysosome repair, promoting healthy aging
研究显示 COVID-19 对疗养院居民的持久影响过去几年，随着病毒在住在一起的弱势老年人中迅速传播，COVID-19 多次在疗养院中肆虐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Study-shows- permanent-effects-of-COVID-19-on-nursing-home-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Study-shows- permanent-effects-of-COVID-19-on-nursing-home-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1311842f-b50e-4757-9b73-98d267670ae0 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 22:15:48 -0500 Study shows lasting effects of COVID-19 on nursing home residents
科学家创造活体痰复制品来研究囊性纤维化感染科学家们设计了一种类似于人类痰的活材料，这将帮助他们更好地了解某种感染是如何在囊性纤维化患者的肺部发展的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Scientists-create-living-phlegm-replica-to-study-cystic-fibrosis-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Scientists-create-living-phlegm-replica-to-study-cystic-fibrosis-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d73247e-1324-4de4-8303-7fe539ae2771 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 22:10:46 -0500 Scientists create living phlegm replica to study cystic fibrosis infections
研究表明益生菌长双歧杆菌如何帮助缓解便秘科学家们已经确定了益生菌长双歧杆菌中负责改善肠道蠕动的基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Study-shows-how-probiotic-Bifidobacteria-longum-can-help-relieve-constipation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Study-shows-how-probiotic-Bifidobacteria-longum-can-help-relieve-constipation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b039fe0-d0f5-4696-ac97-d84ee7c07c79 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 21:39:45 -0500 Study shows how probiotic Bifidobacteria longum can help relieve constipation
听力损失可能导致颞叶和额叶皮层的微观结构差异在美国，超过 60% 的 70 岁及以上成年人患有听力损失，并且已知听力损失与痴呆风险增加有关。这种关联的原因尚不完全清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Hearing-loss-may-lead-to-microstructural-differences-in-temporal-lobe-and-frontal-cortex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Hearing-loss-may-lead-to-microstructural-differences-in-temporal-lobe-and-frontal-cortex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8bfe8d5-abe6-4329-baf6-5e5564cee17a Tue, 21 Nov 2023 21:31:38 -0500 Hearing loss may lead to microstructural differences in temporal lobe and frontal cortex
